state.output:
<file>
00001| // This is your Prisma schema file,
00002| // learn more about it in the docs: https://pris.ly/d/prisma-schema
00003| 
00004| generator client {
00005|   provider = "prisma-client-js"
00006| }
00007| 
00008| datasource db {
00009|   provider = "postgresql"
00010|   url      = env("DATABASE_URL")
00011|   directUrl = env("DIRECT_URL")
00012| }
00013| 
00014| // Auth.js required models
00015| model Account {
00016|   id                String  @id @default(cuid())
00017|   userId            String
00018|   type              String
00019|   provider          String
00020|   providerAccountId String
00021|   refresh_token     String? @db.Text
00022|   access_token      String? @db.Text
00023|   expires_at        Int?
00024|   token_type        String?
00025|   scope             String?
00026|   id_token          String? @db.Text
00027|   session_state     String?
00028| 
00029|   user User @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00030| 
00031|   @@unique([provider, providerAccountId])
00032| }
00033| 
00034| model Session {
00035|   id           String   @id @default(cuid())
00036|   sessionToken String   @unique
00037|   userId       String
00038|   expires      DateTime
00039|   user         User     @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00040| }
00041| 
00042| model User {
00043|   id            String    @id @default(cuid())
00044|   name          String?
00045|   email         String?   @unique
00046|   emailVerified DateTime?
00047|   image         String?
00048|   createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
00049|   updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt
00050| 
00051|   accounts           Account[]
00052|   sessions           Session[]
00053|   translations       Translation[]
00054|   glossaryEntries    GlossaryEntry[]
00055|   translationHistory TranslationHistory[]
00056| 
00057|   @@map("users")
00058| }
00059| 
00060| model VerificationToken {
00061|   identifier String
00062|   token      String   @unique
00063|   expires    DateTime
00064| 
00065|   @@unique([identifier, token])
00066| }
00067| 
00068| // Translator-specific models
00069| model Translation {
00070|   id             String   @id @default(cuid())
00071|   sourceText     String   @db.Text
00072|   translatedText String   @db.Text
00073|   sourceLang     String
00074|   targetLang     String
00075|   domain         String   @default("general")
00076|   userId         String
00077|   createdAt      DateTime @default(now())
00078|   updatedAt      DateTime @updatedAt
00079| 
00080|   user User @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00081| 
00082|   @@index([userId, createdAt])
00083| }
00084| 
00085| model GlossaryEntry {
00086|   id       String  @id @default(cuid())
00087|   source   String
00088|   target   String
00089|   domain   String  @default("general")
00090|   notes    String?
00091|   userId   String
00092|   createdAt DateTime @default(now())
00093|   updatedAt DateTime @updatedAt
00094| 
00095|   user User @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00096| 
00097|   @@index([userId, domain])
00098|   @@unique([userId, source, domain])
00099| }
00100| 
00101| model TranslationHistory {
00102|   id             String   @id @default(cuid())
00103|   sourceText     String   @db.Text
00104|   translatedText String   @db.Text
00105|   sourceLang     String
00106|   targetLang     String
00107|   domain         String   @default("general")
00108|   userId         String
00109|   createdAt      DateTime @default(now())
00110| 
00111|   user User @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00112| 
00113|   @@index([userId, createdAt])
00114| }
00115| 
</file>
state.title: prisma/schema.prisma
